detectors.description:
Reentrancy in BaseReward.getReward(address) (contracts/common/BaseReward.sol#147-171):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(rewardToken).safeTransfer(_for,reward) (contracts/common/BaseReward.sol#159)
	- address(_for).sendValue(reward) (contracts/common/BaseReward.sol#166)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardPaid(_for,reward) (contracts/common/BaseReward.sol#169)
